name: Twitch Rumble
description:
Project realized in collaboration with Paul Ray and Matthias Heughebaert.

Twitch Rumble is a turn-based fighting game designed for streamers. The streamer launches the game via his Twitch channel, then the viewers join the game via the channel's chat.

The game is organized in three types of rounds: 

- Optimization round, where players will be able to customize their character according to the choices on the screen (Example: choice of weapon, choice of weapon optimization, choice on bonuses after movement etc...)

- Action round, where players can attack and move. 

- Observation round (that always precedes an action round), where the actions of each player will be carried out in order on the board.

The last player alive wins the game !
